Dinner will be ready soon.
Are you ready to go?

definition: Противоположный снаружи
examples: The cat is inside the box.
Energy comes from inside.
Why don’t you come inside?

definition: Рядом со всех соторон.
examples: There were flowers all around.
He travels around the world.
Do you live around here?

definition: Это такой яркий вкус.
examples: Seawater is salty.
My soup is too salty.
I don’t like salty food.

definition: Ощущение на языке.
examples: This burger tastes good.
Each has his own taste.
I love ice cream with a taste of strawberry.

definition: Большое количество чего-либо.
examples: How much does it cost?
He is very clever, he knows so much.
You drink too much beer.

definition: Достаточно, чтобы хватило.
examples: Bears are quite dangerous.
Tom can dance quite well.
I have seen him quite recently.

definition: Много весит.
examples: Tom said Mary was quite heavy.
Elephants are very heavy.
This box is very heavy.

definition: Иметь представление о чем-либо.
examples: I know how it works.
Do you know him?
I don’t know what to do.

definition: В ближайшем будущем.
examples: Think first, then talk.
Time for a hot bath, and then it’s bedtime.
Wait for her to return then ask her.

definition: Путешествие на чем-либо.
examples: I wish you a good trip!
Tell me more about your trip.
Kate is back from his trip.

definition: Выполнять полезные действия.
examples: He worked hard.
This is Mark, we work together.
I like working here.

definition: Непросто сделать что-то.
examples: It’s really hard.
Life can be hard.
Bob worked very hard.

definition: Слово-паразит.
examples: Just a moment, please.
Just relax.
What just happened?

definition: Замереть на ногах.
examples: Please stand one meter away.
Don’t move! Stand where you are!
Who is standing there?

definition: Максимальная степень мощи.
examples: This is harder than I thought.
You must try harder.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

definition: Производить мыслительный процесс.
examples: I always think about my family.
Just think about this.
What are you thinking about?

definition: То в чём сила.
examples: It is true.
What she says is true.
Was her story true?

definition: Браться за какое-то дело.
examples: Let’s start again.
Classes start tomorrow.
Kate started dancing.

definition: Хватит того, что и так уже есть.
examples: They have enough money to buy a new car.
This coffee is not hot enough.
One language is never enough.

definition: Происходящее раньше теперь не будет происходить.
examples: It’s not important anymore.
I can’t remember anymore.
No one trusts him anymore.

definition: Ведущий к ошибке.
examples: I read it wrong.
This letter is wrongly addressed.
This is a wrong answer.

definition: Чувствующий себя плохо.
examples: I’m sick.
Do you feel sick?
Ann started feeling sick.

definition: Перед чем-либо.
examples: I can’t leave work until five.
Wait here until I come back.
I will stay until tomorrow.

definition: Переживать о чем-либо.
examples: I worry about him.
Do not worry about that!
What’s worrying you?

definition: Использовать речь.
examples: She talks so much.
Can you come? We need to talk.
I heard you talking with Mary.

definition: Совершать манипуляции со свойствами чего-либо.
examples: Oh, you never change.
Can you change your clothes?
We must change our plan.

definition: Идущий за кем-то.
examples: What’s the next station?
Who is next?
School will start next Monday

definition: Обратное направление.
examples: He will come back soon.
Where’s Mike? He went back home.
My back hurts.

definition: Увидеть что-то потерявшееся.
examples: Excuse me, where I can find orange juice?
I can’t find my socks.
I’ll find another job.

definition: Дающий приятные ощущения на языке.
examples: I want to eat something tasty.
Nothing is so tasty as the dish you make.
This burger is very tasty.

definition: Издавать звуки страдания.
synonyms: cry as if one's heart would break
examples: Little children always cry.
He gave a loud cry for help.
Don’t cry, please.

definition: Предыдущий день.
examples: Yesterday was Sunday.
My cat died yesterday.
It rained all day yesterday.

definition: Тот у кого никого нет.
examples: I have one sister and two brothers.
You can choose only one
She closed one eye.

definition: Указатель на что-то конкретное.
examples: That dog is big.
Look at that picture.
He said that he couldn’t stay.

definition: Сложное местоимение.
examples: Polar bears are bigger than brown bears
I came earlier than her.
Tom sang better than Mary.

definition: И тот и другой.
examples: We are both children.
They both are teachers.
Both girls wear white suits.

definition: Указатель на что-то конкретное.
examples: This book is funny.
Try, this is easy.
Take this box and go

definition: Местоположение на виду.
examples: I have read this book before.
Think before you speak.
I met him once before.

definition: В любое время.
examples: Bigger is not always better.
She always speaks English.
Tom is always watching television.

definition: После него ничего нет.
examples: Summer is coming to an end.
I will stay until the end.
The first jump ended badly.

definition: Время когда уже ничего нельзя сделать.
examples: I go to bed late
The taxi arrived late.
It’s already too late.

definition: Сложное наречие.
examples: I want to go with you, too.
It’s already too late.
She likes chocolate, too.

definition: Говорить о своих проблемах.
examples: There’s nothing to complain about.
You’re always complaining!
She complains all the time.

definition: Противоположный внутри.
examples: It’s cold and dark outside.
You can play outside if you want to.
Tom went outside to smoke a cigarette.

definition: Увеличиваться в размерах.
examples: Money doesn’t grow on trees.
Children grow very quickly.
When I grow up, I want to be a policeman.

definition: В любое время.
examples: Don’t ever forget it.
She looks as young as ever.
Have you ever read this book?

definition: Самый неподходящий.
examples: This was the worst day ever.
Their pizza is the worst.
This is the worst movie I’ve ever seen.

definition: Сложное наречие.
synonyms: as if rooted to the spot
examples: Are you still there?
I’m still in school.
Is Tom still sleeping?

definition: Снизу чего-либо.
examples: Why are you under the bed?
We’re under attack!
His pen was under the table.

definition: Не живой.
examples: Tom isn’t dead yet.
Both his grandfathers are dead.
The soldiers are dead.

definition: Один из худших.
examples: My English is terrible.
She is terrible at cooking.
It is terrible weather today.

definition: Единица измерения времени.
examples: Meet me in an hour.
I slept nine hours.
Rob returned one hour later.

definition: Тот кого не существует.
examples: I’m lucky nobody saw me do that.
Nobody likes Tom.
I hope nobody saw me break the window.

definition: Оказывать поддержку.
synonyms: be unable to prevent oneself from
be unable to break the habit of
examples: Can you help me?
I must help them.
Nobody helped us.

definition: Постоянно падающий из рук.
examples: The road is slippery.
Be careful. The floor is slippery.
The hallway is slippery, so watch your step.

definition: Впитавший много воды.
examples: Cats don’t like to get wet.
He took off his wet shirt.
We are all wet from the sweat.

definition: Наречие которое ставится перед объяснением причины.
synonyms: in view of the fact that
examples: I’m happy because you’re here.
I eat fruits because I am hungry.
We stayed at home because it was raining.

definition: Популярный союз.
examples: I looked but saw nothing.
I want a new computer, but I don’t have enough money.
Everyone is here but Sam.

definition: Происходящее на самом деле.
examples: She really likes cakes.
It tastes really good.
That sounds really interesting.

definition: Существовать где-либо.
examples: I want to be a king.
Don’t be so sad.
This will be interesting.

definition: Местоимение мужского рода.
examples: I can’t find him
I saw him yesterday
I love him.

definition: Сложный предлог.
synonyms: from one side of … to the other
from one side to the other
in and out the other end
in and out the other side
examples: The river runs through the town.
She answered through tears.
He became rich through hard work.

definition: Употребляется чтобы попросить прощения.
examples: I am so sorry.
Sorry, we are closed.
Sorry, what’s your name?

definition: Популярное утверждение.
examples: Do you like pizza? Yes!
Yes, that’s my house.
I didn’t say yes.

definition: Популярное отрицание.
examples: Do you like broccoli? No!
There is no water in the bottle.
No pain, no gain.
